title: Process Automation
description: I have recently been automating business processes using Nintex K2 Five (Automation), particularly in regard to financial reporting for overseas personnel. I also work with WMTek's Site Stacker platform for automating the application process for new personnel.

title: PowerShell? Yes. Bash? Bigger Yes.
description: I keep finding myself using PowerShell for work, especially when working with files. While it occupies more of my time, I still use Bash for personal projects and, when I can get away with it, at work.

title: Friendly to the .NET Ecosystem
description: I typically code in C#, though I have experience working in JavaScript, and I've learned a little Java as well.

title: Technical Writing and Documentation
description: I have a minor in technical writing and worked as a technical editor for three years. Documentation has been a core part of every job I've had.
